scripts.cjs-build: rimraf dist/index.cjs && rollup src/index.js --format cjs --file dist/index.cjs
scripts.es6-build: rimraf dist/lib && rollup src/index.js --format es --preserveModules --dir dist/lib
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run cjs-build && npm run es6-build
scripts.test-all: npm run lint && npm run prettier && npm run test
